1.3.name: wordpress/headmeta
1.3.description:
HeadMeta creates <meta> "description" or "keywords" tags for individual posts or pages. It can also create arbitrary <meta> or <link> tags. These are easily set on a per-post (or page) basis by simply adding Custom Fields.

See the Installation section for more detailed examples.
